channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
@MisfitTorah @yaeltime I think it’s a response to the Evangelical myth that Christianity was a bulwark against Naziism and is never an oppressor.

@MisfitTorah @yaeltime See for example this critique of a Bonhoeffer biography, which argues that the Evangelical biographer distorted the anti-Nazi theologian to make him a good Christian by Southern Baptist standards. https://t.co/eDTBHMZeQA
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @Delafina777 @remembrancermx @della_morte_ @EladNehorai @QueenMab87 @Nymphomachy @silentpenitent @AnIrishVoid @BathysphereHat @ThatRabbiCohen @RebbeSMZ Also responsible for the Bronfman fortune: As Canadians, they could keep brewing. And why let an international border stand in the way of commerce that could fuel Jewish education efforts half a century later?

item.description: @overthisapp4444 A friend from my YU days who went to Barnard had stories of both her aunt and her grandfather being crushed by the YU machine. It runs deep.
item.source:markdown: @overthisapp4444 A friend from my YU days who went to Barnard had stories of both her aunt and her grandfather being crushed by the YU machine. It runs deep.

item.description:
@joshtpm Since I worry about this — it seems the FBI is actually good about returning your phone to you rather quickly if you don’t give them a hard time about cloning it.

@joshtpm Nonetheless, I recently backed up key numbers so I can contact loved ones if I need to resort to a temporary phone.

@joshtpm Also, I make it a point not to conspire to commit federal crimes. Nobody else’s plan is worth even a day away from beloved iPhone 13 mini.
Logan’s Run tried to warn us. https://t.co/tx85e41vU8
item.source:markdown: Logan’s Run tried to warn us. https://t.co/tx85e41vU8

item.description: This is the future Republicans — and their haredi supporters — want. https://t.co/LCcReYxQtu
item.source:markdown: This is the future Republicans — and their haredi supporters — want. https://t.co/LCcReYxQtu

item.description: @yaeltime @ElishevaAvital Where it will be swallowed by a fish. Who will be caught by a fisherman and served as a Shabbos delicacy in Monsey. Wherein the smartphone will be discovered, turned on, and quickly corrupt a wonderful heimische family. Do you really want that on your conscience as YK approaches?
item.source:markdown: @yaeltime @ElishevaAvital Where it will be swallowed by a fish. Who will be caught by a fisherman and served as a Shabbos delicacy in Monsey. Wherein the smartphone will be discovered, turned on, and quickly corrupt a wonderful heimische family. Do you really want that on your conscience as YK approaches?

item.description:
@trayne_wreck Glad to help. And offer my Twitter addiction as a cautionary tale.

@trayne_wreck Did you have screen time rules last year? Do the hours gradually increase as the child approaches age 21?

@trayne_wreck If so, full abolition is unfair to both their past and future selves.

@trayne_wreck Additionally, conflict and adversity builds character. Does your child want to be like the proverbial Tzaddik of Newark, who used to confuse the yetzer hara by giving in without a struggle but — crucially — was doomed to live in Newark?

@trayne_wreck You could remind them that Roman children had no limitations on screen time but conversely could be sold not slavery by their parents. Is that what they want?
@schraubd Certainly statements I believe to be true about my Teaneck community count as antisemitic in the standard surveys.
item.source:markdown: @schraubd Certainly statements I believe to be true about my Teaneck community count as antisemitic in the standard surveys.

item.description: @trekonomics Friedrich Nietzsche-ard told us this about Godard long ago.

item.description:
@bogiperson Let's see. A quick google says His height is 236,000 parasangs, each being 3 miles. Roughly, that's 600k miles to a 6' foot tall man, or a ratio of 100k X 5.286k or (again roughly) a scale of 500 million to 1.

@bogiperson A book cover is a roughly 2 decimeters, 200m nanometers. Which means one book cover's worth of God's Supernal Body is about half a nanometer of a human.

@bogiperson Which seems to be about five hydrogen atoms lined up, so presumably a moderately complex protein or two. https://t.co/lwhJ5WEt7u

@bogiperson Hmmm....

"A prominent Reform synagogue has argued that parents suing over alleged child sex abuse waived their right to bring forth a lawsuit when they signed activity waivers upon enrolling their children in school." https://t.co/nQOPlNDl7b
item.source:markdown: "A prominent Reform synagogue has argued that parents suing over alleged child sex abuse waived their right to bring forth a lawsuit when they signed activity waivers upon enrolling their children in school." https://t.co/nQOPlNDl7b

item.description:
@bogiperson Oooh! Please email me copyright page!

@bogiperson I wonder what a 6x9" portion of a giant God would look like.... #CoverDesignThoughts

item.description:
@MisfitTorah To be fair to YU, I felt the same as a straight student back in the day.

@MisfitTorah One of the most important lessons I learned at Yeshiva College is that Institutions act neither for the good of the ostensible human constituents, or toward their stated values, but for their self preservation and aggrandizement. An important but painful lesson.
item.source:markdown:
@MisfitTorah To be fair to YU, I felt the same as a straight student back in the day.
@MisfitTorah One of the most important lessons I learned at Yeshiva College is that Institutions act neither for the good of the ostensible human constituents, or toward their stated values, but for their self preservation and aggrandizement. An important but painful lesson.

item.description:
@bernstein_judah Yes. Cf Gary Rosenblatt’s Substack post lamenting that Jewish organizations didn’t back up @yaffedorg’s complaint. https://t.co/dYtXvziBZf

@bernstein_judah @yaffedorg Incidentally, if I had to pick a closing date for a study of American Jewry that begins in June 1967, it would end with Gary stepping down from the Jewish Week.
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
@thelibbiegrant @DreadMuller @samstein @jaketapper Yes. There are certain aspects of Muslim observance that my former mayor would do well to take on.

@thelibbiegrant @DreadMuller @samstein @jaketapper Though it’s amazing how much alcohol abuse one can get away with if one is fundamentally decent.

item.description:
@WinterlightHome There are probably a couple small schools in those towns with similar educational neglect, but nothing massive on the scale of the Satmar system in NY — and bringing in that kind of state aid.

@WinterlightHome Chabadniks will send their kids to a community day school, but if there is a critical mass will start their own cheder.
item.source:markdown:
@WinterlightHome There are probably a couple small schools in those towns with similar educational neglect, but nothing massive on the scale of the Satmar system in NY — and bringing in that kind of state aid.
@WinterlightHome Chabadniks will send their kids to a community day school, but if there is a critical mass will start their own cheder.
